= Project Road Map =

== 1.2 == 
[http://code.google.com/p/ehcache-spring-annotations/issues/list?can=1&q=label%3AMilestone-Release1.2.0 1.2.0 Scheduled Issues]
* Add AspectJ support so that both compile and load time class weaving can be used with the caching related annotations.

== 2.0 ==
[http://code.google.com/p/ehcache-spring-annotations/issues/list?can=1&q=label%3AMilestone-Release2.0.0 2.0.0 Scheduled Issues]
* Plugable Cache SPI - Abstract the usage of Ehcache into a generic CacheManager and Cache SPI and implement Ehcache support as a child module. This should allow other caching implementations to be plugged in.
